version_description:
The "Big Cleanup". Improvements to stability, performance and usability. Plus lots of small and bigger bug fixes. Special thanks to Bill for testing and moral support!
The most noteworthy items:
- Auto Zoom Improvements, incl zoom buttons
- Sound Engine Improvements, incl bluetooth HFP
- Bad GPS Reception handling
- Map Rotation Stuck
- Improvements to Sync
- No more forced portrait mode
- Next turn arrow showing immediately
- Updated Support & FAQs
- Added Diagnostics
- Improvements to route matching import
- Fix for persistent 'No Offline Maps' alert
- Backup trip logs saved on device

Addendum to The "Big Cleanup". Improvements to stability, performance and usability. Plus lots of small and bigger bug fixes. Special thanks to Bill for testing and moral support!
The most noteworthy items:
- Auto Zoom Improvements, incl zoom buttons
- Sound Engine Improvements, incl bluetooth HFP
- Bad GPS Reception handling
- Map Rotation Stuck
- Improvements to Sync
- No more forced portrait mode
- Next turn arrow showing immediately
- Updated Support & FAQs
- Added Diagnostics
- Improvements to route matching import
- Fix for persistent 'No Offline Maps' alert
- Backup trip logs saved on device

Now available in English, Spanish, French, German and Dutch. Improved online Search. Stability improvements and bug fixes. Fixed bugs:
- No voice with iOS11 beta
- northUp not consistent
- Speedometer not going to 0
- 3D setting not rememberd
- Screen lock during navigation in specific circumstances
- Zoom buttons disappearing after being backgrounded
- No Curvy routing when using 'Send to Scenic' button on Kurviger.de while browsing on iOS device.
- Voice instruction following eachother too soon.

Stability improvements and bug fixes for:
- Zoom and 2D/3D resets
- Route Review not appearing
- Rare encoded GPX import
- French Language Updates
- Arbitrary crashes on trip start

Bugfixes for:
- Offline Maps being (partially) removed by iOS when low on storage space
- Crashes when starting navigation for 'older' devices
- Tweaked distances when audio instructions play

Bugfixes for bugs that are only surfacing on iOS11 (beta) devices:
- Map rotation issue in Navigation screen and returning from background
- Turn arrow not showing when Theme set to 'black' (or set to automatic after sunset)

New Map Version
Stability Improvements
- Improvement to distance of Audio Instructions
Emergency fix for crashes on startup (mostly iOS10 devices)

- Fixes a bug where Scenic could get into a state where it repeatedly crashed upon opening.
- Minor iOS11 related bug fixes
Stability Improvements
Fixes a bug where the app could crash when backgrounded
Minor Bugfixes & Stability Improvements

- Stability and performance improvements for large accounts
- Fix for vehicle editing

- New Map Version
- Removed 'Bad GPS Reception' sound

- New map version
- Bugfix for exporting routes/trips with slash '/' in name
Fix for export not working on iPad

- New Map Version
- Fixed occasional crash on starting navigation for longer routes
Fixed bug where UI elements were blown up on iPhone 6 and up.

Fixed bug where app would crash when opening a GPX in Scenic through another app.
Fixed bug where total trip mileage showed 0 in main screen (profile table)

- Bugfix for app crashing on iOS10 when starting trip
- Increased POI level detail on map

Fix for crashing when starting navigation on iOS9 & iOS10
Fix for sound not starting when reaching route and phone locked or Scenic in background
Fix for glitch in Sign Up
Expanded location search
Improved Offline Map Download performance
Added setting to configure POI detail on map
New Map Version
Addressed occasional crashes when searching for Scenic routes

- New Map Version
- Removed 'Bad GPS Reception' sound

Scenic was already the top ranked and best rated motorcycle navigation app in most countries, but now Scenic 2 will blow you away! A new design, new features and countless improvements, all based on user feedback. Just to name a few: round trip suggestions, stops ánd via points, improved route import, elevation profiles, better curvy routing algorithm, folders to organise your routes and rides, improved voice instructions, 'glove friendly' user interface, insights in your riding patterns. And that's just the tip of the iceberg. Scenic 2 is built on the lessons learned from Scenic 1. It turns your phone into a true competitor for the big brand motorcycle GPS units; in some ways it's even better. It's new, it's improved, it's more value for money and it's free to try, including the premium features. You don't even need to create an account. There are no pesky sign-up forms upon launch. So, let's get rolling...

Scenic was already the top ranked and best rated motorcycle navigation app in most countries, but now Scenic 2 will blow you away! Version 2.1 adds more new features, enhancements and bug fixes:

=================================
===== 2.1.0 Release Notes =====
=================================
NEW FEATURES
- Find Scenic Routes (in the routes tab at the bottom)
- Resume Ride After Crash
- Ability to turn off GPS when manually pausing ride
- Turn a via into a stop and vs versa (in route editor only)
- Turn ALL vias into stops and vs versa (in route editor only)
- Rename a stop (in route editor only)
- Battery Indicator for iPhones in landscape mode
- Split Screen support for iPad

BIG CHANGES
- Routes saved with 'Save blue line as track' are no longer navigable with Turn-by-turn and voice. They now behave like Scenic 1 tracks did. Simply a line on the map for you to visually follow.
- The turn-by-turn arrow now shows a straight ahead arrow until the first instruction for a turn comes up. This is similar to Scenic 1. Had to revert back to this to resolve the first bug mentioned below.


ENHANCEMENTS
- Changed look of the route and ride details screen, increasing the discoverability of the functions and buttons which were below the map
- Increased download speed of Offline Maps
- Color of text in search field in dark mode
- Added 10 sec. auto-hide to trackings stats / route timeline panel
- Showing POIs on lower zoom level
- Disabled 'telenav' attribution link to prevent accidental tapping and opening the link
- Translation Corrections
- Navigation doesn't automatically start anymore after selecting a search result from the list. It's first shown on the map now after which you can choose to add location to route or not.
- Enlarged current position indicator in 3D
- In start screen, the map center is now taken as center for the search, in stead of your current location
- While adding/editing a location, the Lat/Lon fields now also accept commas as decimal separator
- Confirmation dialog to cancel route editing now always pops-up


FIXED BUGS
- Turn-by-turn arrow sometimes points in the wrong direction, not in-line with route and voice instruction
- Current position on map lagging behind while navigating
- No 'previous marker' to tap when wanting to add via/stop after the route start
- Stops disappearing when repeatedly showing the route timeline
- Stops don't export into the GPX
- Navigation of generated round trip 'reached destination' while just getting started
- Adding Stop Name textfield disappearing behind keyboard when tapping 'enter'
- Not able to pinch-rotate map in start screen and route edit Screen
- GPX Export with lats or lons close to 0 are not compatible with BaseCamp due to these lats/lons being exported in Scientific notation (1e-06)
- Showing 'Category_xxx' in search results in stead of category name
- Navigation loads slow or crashes when big Custom POI collections are added
- When full canada map installed, you still get 'Missing Offline Map' for Canada provinces
- When navigating a track and wanting to view Tracking Stats, the app crashes
- Import button for waypoints is missing, if there is only one waypoint in the GPX file
- Current Position indicator lagging behind during Navigation
- Doesn't center on selected location when selecting location from locations tab
- Tracking paused when going through tunnel
- 'Organise folders' function only works once during a session
- In route edit screen, sometimes the wrong buttons show in the Callout bubble, depending on the circumstance.
- Missing GPXX scheme link in exported GPX files
- Polish voice instructions are english instructions pronounced with Polish accent
- Voice Volume
- Crash when saving a ride
- Crash on startup
- Crash when going to Settings and tapping Start
- Crash when exporting a track
- Crash when app is in background during a break

FIXED BUGS

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.1.1 brings new features that you've been asking for as well as some bug fixes!

NEW FEATURES / ENHANCEMENTS
- Added riding time, break time, max speed and #coordinates to ride details
- Country and State borders now visible in all zoom levels
- Full screen map view for rides and routes
- Map downloads are now queued. (No more than 3 downloads simultaneously)
- Disk space check before downloading maps and other space consuming actions

BUG FIXES
- Freezes and Crashes during navigation, related to Custom POIs
- Crashes when importing GPX files with many elements
- Text in nav menu beging truncated on smaller devices
- Not switching to dark/light mode after returning from background
- Lag in Current Position indicator while navigating
- Voice Volume too low when playing music over bluetooth
- Compass and Scale hidden behind blur area on main screen
- Dragging route to different folder shows route at bottom of table
- Not being able to save route after manual fixing a route error
- Trail line disappearing after going to background
- Last used routing mode not remembered
- Stop announcement not playing when normal guidance instruction is playing

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.0 brings a new map version, improves the auto-zoom for 2D mode, fixes the not auto-pausing bug and fixes Scenic not showing up when exporting a GPX from Google Drive.

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.0 brings a new map version, improves the auto-zoom for 2D mode, fixes the not auto-pausing bug and fixes Scenic not showing up when exporting a GPX from Google Drive.

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.2 addresses the overestimating of route durations and a few minor bugs and enhancements:

=================================
===== 2.2.2 Release Notes =====
=================================
BUG FIXES
- Screen auto-locking after taking a picture in-app
- 'Select All' button not visually selecting all waypoints while importing from GPX
- Map showing names only in local language in locations tab
- Crash on importing GPX files with unknown GPX extension


ENHANCEMENTS
- Improved Route Duration Estimation (typically were too high)
- When pasting GPX import URL without http://, it's added now automatically

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.3 contains 3 new features and addresses some minor bugs:

=================================
===== 2.2.3 Release Notes =====
=================================
NEW FEATURES
- Setting to hide max speed throughout the app
- Show previous rides and routes on map during route editing
- Toggle POI visibility per Custom POI Group during route editing


BUG FIXES
- Routing takes on- and offramp in stead of continuing on highway
- Crash when changing tab while organising routes
- Crash when moving via point to a POI location
- Tapping 5th scenic route opens 4th
- Updating shortcut name doesn't update in settings tab
- Remaining distance jumping when taking a pictures in app
- Speed indicator not going to 0 when stopped

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.4 addresses the low voice volume when listening to music, makes large map downloads more robust to intermittent connectivity issues and contains a few smaller enhancements and bug fixes:

=================================
===== 2.2.4 Release Notes =====
=================================
ENHANCEMENTS
- Voice Volume: can now be increased to a higher level (iOS13 only)
- Large Map Downloads: are now more robust to intermittent connectivity issues
- Screen Auto-Lock: is now also prevented when in the start screen
- Auto-pausing: less sensitive to jumping GPS signal when inside
- Nav Menu: clearer icons and more distinguishable colors
- GPX Import through URL: now adds 'http://' if it's not entered by user

BUG FIXES
- Music Volume staying lower after a few instructions
- Music not resuming after playing instruction over HFP
- Speed graph not being hidden when 'Hide Max Speed' is ON

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. With version 2.2.5 you can now EASILY SHARE YOUR RIDES AND ROUTES with anyone you want in any way you want.

=================================
===== 2.2.5 Release Notes =====
=================================
NEW FEATURES
- Easy share your rides and routes with anyone and everywhere, through a link

ENHANCEMENTS
- Improvements to route import algorithm, reducing the need for manual corrections.

BUG FIXES
- Voice stopping after few instructions when paying with credits

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.6 solves a voice / background music bug, a routing bug and some other minor bugs.

=================================
===== 2.2.6 Release Notes =====
=================================
ENHANCEMENTS
- More clear which pictures are public

BUG FIXES
- Voice instructions sometimes stop after a while
- Music volume sometimes remains ducked after an instruction
- Sometimes taking on- and off ramps in stead of staying on highway
- Changing ride picture 'isPublic' status not being saved
- Sometimes pictures not being uploaded to server
- Default vehicle when saving trip is not last used vehicle

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.7 fixes the voice instructions stopping after a while, fixes other minor bugs and adds some enhancements.

=================================
===== 2.2.7 Release Notes =====
=================================
FIXES FOR FOLLOWING BUGS:
- Music buttons (play/pause, next, previous) in 'Big Button' menu not working under iOS13.4
- Audio Instructions stopping after a while
- Music volume remaining ducked after a voice instruction
- Weird routing choices in Efficient routing mode
- Resume button not removed when tracking was resumed while in background
- Exported GPX files not importing in Harley Davidson Infotainment system

ENHANCEMENTS
- Offline Route Line is now wider for better visibility during navigation
- More map elements can be shown/hidden now (highway nr badges, street name popups, city names)
- Added 'NITPICKY CONFIG' section for those wanting deeper customisation (3D Camera Angle, 3D Camera Distance, Detour/Recalculate Timeout Duration, Offline Route Line Width)
- Changed Settings behaviour (Sections now open in new screen in stead of 'harmonica'/folding/unfolding animation)
- Left screen edge swipe works as back button tap now

=================================

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.8 fixes bugs around voice instructions, screen flow on iOS12 and other minor things.

=================================
====== 2.2.8 Release Notes ======
=================================
BUG FIXES:
- Irregularities for Voice Output 'Force to Device Speaker' and 'as Phonecall HFP'
- No voice instructions when bluetooth headset / com-set connected after start of nav session
- No voice after Cardo intercom usage
- No voice and music remaining ducked after unanswered phonecall
- Strange behaviour when using back gesture edge swipe
- Distance changing when zooming in on route while in edit mode
- Auto Pause not initiating when moving indoors with bad GPS reception
- Route modifications don't update immediately in route list
- Dashboard/Menu wheel disappearing when going into settings submenu on iOS12
- Position not moving in Tunnel (partial fix)
- Change in 3D Camera Angle not taking effect in next nav session
- First time tapping zoom out button zooms the map in
- Cosmetic issues with overlapping / too long texts
- Obscure issue where only first section of offline maps and settings are expanding / opening

ENHANCEMENTS:
- Changed terminology for 'Nitpicky Config' to 'Navi Nerd Details'
- Max Zoom now zooms more
- Changed terminology for 'Offroad Route' to 'Track' (inline with GPX terminology)
- Extra curvy generation now uses Efficient routing (which gives more accurate route duration estimates)
- Route re-calculation failure alert only showing temporarily now

- Route re-calculation failure alert only showing temporarily now

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.9 contains lots of little (and some big) new features and enhancements + some bug fixes.

BUGS FIXED:
- Lag in current position
- Unrealistic route durations Canada
- Older routes in Netherlands now routing differently than designed
- User reputation points not syncing correctly
- Crash when rating someone else's route without being logged in
- Strange location 'jumps' in recorded rides, affecting ride distance
- Auto zoom not working for 3D mode
- Voice Instructions stopping mid ride
- Unrealistic route durations Netherlands
- Foto pins for a ride or route all showing same foto
- Cancel button not working when selecting a color in Light / Dark mode settings
- 3D camera settings in Navi Nerd section don’t take effect immediately
- Clipped text in sorting Scenic Public Routes buttons
- Current guidance instruction is clipping distance tot turn while it should clip text of street name if necessary
- Route is not cleared when canceling from route editor. Route shows on map when starting a ride without nav.
- Rerouting asking to skip via, even while there are no vias
- On occasion, recalculation keeps sending back to start point
NEW FEATURES:
- Option to always show original route during navigation (Settings > Navigation & Tracking)
- Delay and default choice for 'Skip Next Via/Stop' alert is now configurable (Settings > Navi Nerd Details)
- Duration for 'Stop/POI close by' message now configurable (Settings > Navi Nerd Details)
- Ability to disconnect Scenic from Furkot and RouteYou from within the App
- Ability to hide route behind you (part that's already ridden)
- Ability to control all media apps through nav menu playback buttons (now you can control Spotify, Pandora, Overcast, etc.)
- Tapping top bar (with upcoming navigation instruction) repeats last spoken voice instruction
- Zoom buttons now always show when going to route edit mode during navigation
- Ability to change the height of the horizon (sky) in 3D mode (Settings > Navi Nerd Detail)
- Added Movement Threshold & Framerate Navi Nerd Details (influence performance and battery life)
ENHANCEMENTS:
- Distance for round trip generation is now remembered
- Detour behaviour 'recalculate' now also works for routes without stops & vias (destination only)
- Last turn instruction (e.g. "Now turn left") is now played later (was too early)
- Tapping compass in Start screen and in Route Editor now rotates the map North Up
- Zoom buttons now are more sensitive (smaller steps) for 2D mode
- A warning is now shown if a combination of Detour Behaviour 'Recalculate' and Via Point Pro mode ON is selected
- Zoom and menu buttons now more visible (color now linked to map style in stead of dark/regular mode)
- Changed distances for blocked roads
- Ability to hear speeding alerts even if voice is muted
- Changed button order in nav menu landscape mode (more intuitive for audio controls)
- Give border to buttons in bubble home screen (after selecting location)
- Put navigate button first in button row above map preview for routes
- WunderLINQ wheel movements now 'loop' through to other side
- Ability to alter curvy route and round trip when generated in main screen
- Ability to change guidance to route after unexpected app termination

TRANSLATION:
- Corrections for French interface language

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Version 2.2.9 contains lots of little (and some big) new features and enhancements + some bug fixes.

BUGS FIXED:
- Lag in current position
- Unrealistic route durations Canada
- Older routes in Netherlands now routing differently than designed
- User reputation points not syncing correctly
- Crash when rating someone else's route without being logged in
- Strange location 'jumps' in recorded rides, affecting ride distance
- Auto zoom not working for 3D mode
- Voice Instructions stopping mid ride
- Unrealistic route durations Netherlands
- Foto pins for a ride or route all showing same foto
- Cancel button not working when selecting a color in Light / Dark mode settings
- 3D camera settings in Navi Nerd section don’t take effect immediately
- Clipped text in sorting Scenic Public Routes buttons
- Current guidance instruction is clipping distance tot turn while it should clip text of street name if necessary
- Route is not cleared when canceling from route editor. Route shows on map when starting a ride without nav.
- Rerouting asking to skip via, even while there are no vias
- On occasion, recalculation keeps sending back to start point
NEW FEATURES:
- Option to always show original route during navigation (Settings > Navigation & Tracking)
- Delay and default choice for 'Skip Next Via/Stop' alert is now configurable (Settings > Navi Nerd Details)
- Duration for 'Stop/POI close by' message now configurable (Settings > Navi Nerd Details)
- Ability to disconnect Scenic from Furkot and RouteYou from within the App
- Ability to hide route behind you (part that's already ridden)
- Ability to control all media apps through nav menu playback buttons (now you can control Spotify, Pandora, Overcast, etc.)
- Tapping top bar (with upcoming navigation instruction) repeats last spoken voice instruction
- Zoom buttons now always show when going to route edit mode during navigation
- Ability to change the height of the horizon (sky) in 3D mode (Settings > Navi Nerd Detail)
- Added Movement Threshold & Framerate Navi Nerd Details (influence performance and battery life)
ENHANCEMENTS:
- Distance for round trip generation is now remembered
- Detour behaviour 'recalculate' now also works for routes without stops & vias (destination only)
- Last turn instruction (e.g. "Now turn left") is now played later (was too early)
- Tapping compass in Start screen and in Route Editor now rotates the map North Up
- Zoom buttons now are more sensitive (smaller steps) for 2D mode
- A warning is now shown if a combination of Detour Behaviour 'Recalculate' and Via Point Pro mode ON is selected
- Zoom and menu buttons now more visible (color now linked to map style in stead of dark/regular mode)
- Changed distances for blocked roads
- Ability to hear speeding alerts even if voice is muted
- Changed button order in nav menu landscape mode (more intuitive for audio controls)
- Give border to buttons in bubble home screen (after selecting location)
- Put navigate button first in button row above map preview for routes
- WunderLINQ wheel movements now 'loop' through to other side
- Ability to alter curvy route and round trip when generated in main screen
- Ability to change guidance to route after unexpected app termination

TRANSLATION:
- Corrections for French interface language

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Scenic 2.3.0 brings a new map version and solves an important bug for those using Scenic with iPhone in pocket.

ENHANCEMENTS:
- NEW MAP VERSION!!!
- Changed default ride name
- Dutch language adjustments

BUG FIXES:
- Ride remaining paused (not auto-resuming) when Scenic is used with locked iPhone (resulting in no voice instructions and no tracking after a pause, until Scenic is brought to foreground)
- When saving as track, the distance and duration of calculated route is saved in stead of the distance and duration of track itself

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Scenic 2.3.0 brings a new map version and solves an important bug for those using Scenic with iPhone in pocket.

ENHANCEMENTS:
- NEW MAP VERSION!!!
- Changed default ride name
- Dutch language adjustments

BUG FIXES:
- Ride remaining paused (not auto-resuming) when Scenic is used with locked iPhone (resulting in no voice instructions and no tracking after a pause, until Scenic is brought to foreground)
- When saving as track, the distance and duration of calculated route is saved in stead of the distance and duration of track itself

Scenic 2 is a true alternative to expensive motorcycle GPS units. Scenic 2.3.1 brings some bug fixes and small enhancements.

ENHANCEMENTS
- Going to edit mode during navigation now through double tap (in stead of dragging the map, which was sometimes accidentally activated by rain or movement)
- Added state/provice to country ranking list

BUG FIXES
- Voice stopping during a ride in some circumstances
- Durations of recorded trips too long in some scenarios
- Detour detected banner permanently showing when timeout set to 0 seconds
- Blurred rectangular area showing on iPad sometimes
- Climb and decent values sometimes wrong
- Not premium message showing for tracks when unmuting the voice
- Pipe character in waypoint name causing problems with POI import
- Beep before instruction can not be turned off when 'HFP' as voice output
